summary: The following is a list of country calling codes.
full_text:
239 is the North American telephone area code for a large area of Southwest Florida. It includes Lee and Collier counties, small parts of Hendry and Charlotte counties and the Everglades National Park in Mainland Monroe County. It was created in 2003 as an area code split from area code 941.
Area code 239 includes:
